comments.body: Ah, I never got around to add the update Gustav's links into the template. Please do.
How did I even miss it when syncing it up with alpakka-kafka's...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@

  (https://doc.akka.io/docs/alpakka/$ALPAKKA_VERSION$/) documentation
